Module watmod

261 :       
262 :       module watmod
263 : !***********************************************************************
264 : !*  Module defining variables and parameters for the water balance 
265 : !*  model (watbal).
266 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
267 : !*  Author: Stan Schymanski, Max Planck Institute for Biogeochemistry
268 : !*  Email: sschym@bgc-jena.mpg.de
269 : !*  06/2008
270 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
271 : 
272 : !***********************************************************************
273 : !*    Parameters for Water balance model
274 : !***********************************************************************
275 : 
276 :       INTEGER :: nlayersnew   ! Number of layers in unsaturated zone for next time step
277 : 
278 :       REAL*8  :: cz           ! Average soil elevation in m
279 :       REAL*8  :: cgs          ! Capital Gamma S (length scale for seepage outflow) (m)
280 : 
281 :       REAL*8  :: ksat_        ! Saturated hydraulic conductivity
282 :       REAL*8  :: epsln_       ! Soil porosity
283 :       REAL*8  :: nvg_         ! Van Genuchten soil parameter n
284 :       REAL*8  :: mvg_         ! Van Genuchten soil parameter m
285 :       REAL*8  :: avg_         ! Van Genuchten soil parameter a
286 :       REAL*8  :: zs_          ! Reference elevation point (set to 0)
287 :       REAL*8  :: zr_          ! Average channel elevation
288 :       REAL*8  :: go_          ! Slope close to channel in radians 
289 :       REAL*8  :: thetas_      ! Saturated soil water content
290 :       REAL*8  :: thetar_      ! Residual soil water content
291 :       REAL*8  :: wsold        ! Previous total soil water storage
292 :       REAL*8  :: delz_        ! Thickness of each soil layer (m)
293 : 
294 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: ksatvec(:)         ! Saturated hydraulic conductivit
295 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: epslnvec(:)        ! Soil porosity
296 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: nvgvec(:)          ! Van Genuchten soil parameter n
297 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: mvgvec(:)          ! Van Genuchten soil parameter m
298 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: avgvec(:)          ! Van Genuchten soil parameter a
299 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: thetasvec(:)       ! Saturated soil water content
300 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: thetarvec(:)       ! Residual soil water content
301 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: sueqvec(:)         ! Soil saturation degree above water table in hydrostatic equilibrium
302 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: cH2Ol_s(:)         ! Soil water content in each layer (could also be called thetavec(:)) 
303 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: iovec(:)           ! Mass balance for each soil layer
304 : 
305 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: suvec_(:)          ! Soil saturation degree in each layer
306 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: sunewvec(:)        ! Soil saturation degree in each layer at next time step
307 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: kunsatvec(:)       ! Unsaturated hydraulic conductivity in each soil layer
308 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: delzvec(:)         ! Thickness of each soil layer
309 : 
310 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: qblvec(:)          ! Water flux across bottom boundary of each layer (positive upwards)
311 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: dsuvec(:)          ! Rate of change in soil saturation degree in each layer
312 :  !     REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: delznewvec(:)     
313 :  !     REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: wsnewvec(:)        ! Soil water content in each layer at next time step
314 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: pcapnewvec(:)      ! Matric pressure head in each layer at next time step
315 : 
316 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: kunsatnewvec(:)    ! Unsaturated hydraulic conductivity in each layer at next time step
317 : 
318 :       REAL*8  :: ys_          ! Elevation of water table
319 : !      REAL*8  :: yu__
320 : !      REAL*8  :: omgu_
321 : !      REAL*8  :: omgo_
322 :       REAL*8  :: esoil__      ! Bare soil evaporation rate
323 :       REAL*8  :: ysnew        ! Elevation of water table at next time step
324 : !      REAL*8  :: yunew_
325 :       REAL*8  :: wsnew_       ! Total soil water store at next time step
326 :       REAL*8  :: io_          ! Mass balance of soil water
327 :       REAL*8  :: iocum        ! Cumulative mass balance of soil water
328 :       REAL*8  :: spgfcf__     ! Seepage face flow rate
329 :       REAL*8  :: hspgfcf      ! Hourly seepage face flow
330 :       REAL*8  :: infx__       ! Infiltration excess runoff rate
331 :       REAL*8  :: hinfx        ! Hourly infiltration excess runoff
332 :       REAL*8  :: hio          ! Hourly mass balance of soil water
333 :       REAL*8  :: hesoil       ! Hourly soil evaporation
334 :       REAL*8  :: hetm_        ! Hourly transpiration
335 :       REAL*8  :: inf_         ! Infiltration rate
336 :  !     REAL*8  :: omgunew
337 :  !     REAL*8  :: omgonew
338 :       REAL*8  :: hinf_        ! Hourly infiltration rate
339 : 
340 :       end module watmod
